nws.name: Overnight
nws.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 23. North wind around 5 mph.

nws.name: Sunday
nws.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a high near 37. Northeast wind 5 to 10 mph.

nws.name: Sunday Night
nws.detailedForecast: Snow between 9pm and 3am, then snow and areas of blowing snow. Cloudy, with a low around 28. Northeast wind 10 to 26 mph, with gusts as high as 51 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New snow accumulation of 3 to 5 inches possible.

nws.name: Monday
nws.shortForecast: Heavy Snow And Areas Of Blowing Snow
nws.detailedForecast: Snow and areas of blowing snow. Cloudy, with a high near 33. North wind 23 to 30 mph, with gusts as high as 56 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New snow accumulation of 12 to 18 inches possible.

nws.name: Monday Night
nws.detailedForecast: Snow before 2am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 22. Northwest wind 12 to 22 mph, with gusts as high as 43 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New snow accumulation of 1 to 2 inches possible.

nws.name: Tuesday
nws.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 32. West wind around 12 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

nws.name: Tuesday Night
nws.shortForecast: Partly Cloudy then Slight Chance Light Snow
nws.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow after 5am. Partly cloudy, with a low around 14. West wind 5 to 8 mph.

nws.name: Wednesday
nws.detailedForecast: Snow likely before 1pm, then rain and snow likely. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 37. South wind 5 to 9 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New snow accumulation of 1 to 2 inches possible.

nws.name: Wednesday Night
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of rain and snow before 3am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 28. Southwest wind around 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%.

nws.name: Thursday
nws.shortForecast: Slight Chance Light Snow then Chance Light Rain
nws.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow between 8am and 9am, then a chance of rain. Partly sunny, with a high near 40. Southwest wind around 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%.

nws.name: Thursday Night
nws.shortForecast: Chance Rain And Snow then Rain And Snow Likely
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of rain before 8pm, then a chance of rain and snow between 8pm and 9pm, then rain and snow likely. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 30. Southeast wind around 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%.

nws.name: Friday
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of rain and snow. Partly sunny, with a high near 38. Northwest wind around 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%.

nws.name: Friday Night
nws.shortForecast: Slight Chance Light Snow then Mostly Clear
nws.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow before 9pm. Mostly clear, with a low around 22. West wind around 7 mph.

nws.name: Saturday
nws.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 41. Southwest wind around 8 mph.
